vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to dedicate, consecrate, separate
1a) (Niphal) to dedicate oneself, devote oneself
1b) (Hiphil) to keep sacredly separate
§ 1) to dedicate, consecrate, separate
1a) (Niphal) to dedicate oneself, devote oneself
1b) (Hiphil) to keep sacredly separate
vocabinfos._es_Definition: nif.   retirarse, apartarse, separarse, abstenerse de\hif. (causative) ; nif. (= nif.)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 獻身, 奉獻, 分開
1a) (Niphal) 委身自己, 奉獻自己, 分別為聖
1b) (Hiphil) 使分別為聖, 警惕遠離
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 献身, 奉献, 分开
1a) (Niphal) 委身自己, 奉献自己, 分别为圣
1b) (Hiphil) 使分别为圣, 警惕远离
